resources.string: To help develop course material that best suits your needs, we would like to ask you several questions to help us improve. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us!
Before beginning this class, where would you consider your level of experience in relation to the course material?
It takes me longer to complete projects than what I believe is expected of me.
I complete projects proficiently and have a fundamental understanding of the course work.
I have an advanced understanding that goes beyond what the course provides.
